modName: Diranars Glass Weapon Transparent Mod V1 Multicolorpack
summary: Gorgous Transparent 3 Colour Glass Weaopon Replacer
descriptionHtml:
Glass Weapon Recolour Mod - Transparent Weapons (Replacement)
- by Diranar -
                                     - All Weapons (incl. Shield)

			Available in 3 Stunning Colours :
			---------------------------------

			\"Like Saphire\"		. the Blue Package
			\"Like Bloodstone\"	. the Red Package 
			\"Like Obsidian\"		. the Black package

	1. What is this ?....

This Mod will Replace the Vanilla Glass Weapons Green Texture Parts to 
either a High Quality Blue, Red or Black Colour including Transparent Glass Effect. 
Be Sure that i take my time for my mods and hope you like them as i do.

Its an addition to my already released Glass Multi Color Replacer Mod.
You can find it also on Nexus, just Search for \"Diranar\".

I have only used the original textures and meshes and replaced the Glass Parts only, the rest of the weapons is as it is in Vanilla.

Texture Size is the same as Original, so no frame drops at all to be expected 
(none on my system)


	2. How to Install this

Use WinRar or any other depacker Prog to extract the files.
Move the Data folder from the color of your choice to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

To those who are new to using Elder Scrolls mods:

This is a simple Replace-Mod, so all Glass Weapons in-Game will be changed 
at once and you can only us one colour at the same time.
(But you can mix the textures of course, if you like...)


	3. Uh really ? ... Uninstallation

-Remove the following folders:

Data\\textures\\weapons\\glass 

Data\\textures\\armor\\glass


	4. Is it Compatibel with the other stuff ?

Mod should be compatible with every other mod, except Glass  
Weapon Texture Replacer Mods.


	5. What do i need to get this to work ?


The Game itself would be fine..
author: Diranar
